summary: VOLKSWAGEN 2002 PASSAT TURBO, IGNITION COILS ARE BAD AND VOLKSWAGEN WON'T REPLACE THEM UNTIL THEY START TO GO BAD, WHICH MEANS THAT YOU HAVE TO WAIT FOR YOUR CAR TO BREAK DOWN 4 TIMES AND GET TOWED FOUR TIMES BEFORE THEY WILL FIX IT.  I HAVE READ REVIEWS WHERE PEOPLE HAVE HAD ALL 4 COILS REPLACED AND THEN HAD TO HAVE THOSE REPLACED.  I AM TERRIFIED TO DRIVE MY CAR THAT I PAY OVER $300 DOLLARS A MONTH ON AND I DO NOT WANT IT ANYMORE!
